title: Photography festival themed on horse culture opens in Inner Mongolia
content: People give a performance during a photography festival themed on the horse culture on grassland at Bashang Pasture in Chifeng City, north China's Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, Jan. 6, 2020. The 3rd edition of the photography festival featuring horse-themed performances opened on Monday and will last till Jan. 8. (Xinhua/Xu Qin)
